summary: Angela, a naive hairdresser, is kicked out of the house by her puritanical mother. At the behest of a model client, she gets her first modeling gig. While her future seems bright, she soon learns that everyone around her wants to use her.
cast: Chantal Contouri|Robert Bruning|Sigrid Thornton|Hugh Keays-Byrne|Denise Drysdale|Vincent Gil|Jon Sidney|Jacqui Gordon|Julia Blake|Peter Stratford|Christine Amor|Lulu Pinkus|Stewart Faichney|Chris Milne|Bob Brown|Peter Felmingham|Steven Clark|Everett De Roche
title: Snapshot
